FuncDef: This command specifies a source IP port, source port list, or source range to use as match criteria.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that a successful match occurs when the flow matches the specified port.
Specifies all port numbers greater than the port-number match.
Specifies all port numbers less than the port-number match.
Specifies the source port number. Values-0 to 65535.
Specifies the start or end source port number. Values-0 to 65535.
Specifies a named port-list, up to 32 characters, containing a set of ports or ranges of ports.
